title.en: Weather & Best Time to Visit Manarola
Manarola Weather 2025 | Best Time to Visit & Climate Guide

description.en: Manarola weather guide. Monthly temperatures, rainfall, and the best seasons to visit Cinque Terre's most scenic village.

subtitle.en: Mediterranean climate with mild winters and warm summers. Learn the best times to visit and what to expect throughout the year.
subtitle.it: Clima mediterraneo mite tutto l'anno. Stagioni diverse offrono esperienze uniche: primavera fiorita, estate balneare, autunno vendemmiale, inverno autentico.

description.en: Perfect weather 15-22°C. Wildflowers bloom, fewer crowds. Ideal for hiking and photography.
description.it: Ideale per trekking. Temperature 15-22°C, fioritura, poca folla. Possibili piogge ad aprile. La stagione perfetta.

description.en: Hot 25-30°C. Peak season with crowds. Best for swimming and sunbathing.
description.it: Alta stagione. 25-30°C, mare caldo, spiagge, eventi. Molto affollato e caro. Caldo intenso sui sentieri.

description.en: Warm 18-25°C. Grape harvest season. Great weather with reduced crowds.
description.it: Eccellente per visite. 18-25°C in settembre, vendemmia, colori caldi. Meno turisti. Piogge in novembre.

description.en: Mild 8-15°C. Quiet season. See the famous nativity scene, but some restaurants close.
description.it: Bassa stagione. 8-15°C, molti servizi chiusi, poca folla. Autentico ma limitato. Presepe di Manarola a dicembre.

description.en: Wettest Oct-Nov. Driest June-August. Occasional storms can close hiking trails.
Year-round spectacular sunsets. Summer offers longest days. Clear skies in September-October.
